title: Business Development Manager
description: Hybrid/Remote PositionIdeal candidate traits🧠 Understand the Web3 landscape and community. You have a deep understanding of the Web3 project landscape and are able to quickly identity partnership opportunities.🗣 Communication Skills: You must be able to communicate with clients of all backgrounds and technical focuses. Well-developed written and verbal communication skills are must-haves.🗂 Organizational skills: You must be comfortable juggling numerous clients, on- and off-site meetings, and deadlines. Individuals who are highly organized are best equipped to manage the many parts of the job and keep client proposals and other tasks on track.❤️‍🔥 Drive and self-motivation: The most successful business development managers are goal-oriented and mission-driven. Our team is decentralized, so a successful BD needs to be intrinsically motivated to do well & deliver value.Powered by JazzHRiz9rcIwPNp
